channel.title: returning on Twilight Courier
channel.description: Recent content in returning on Twilight Courier

item.title: Considerations 2
item.description:
Considerations_2
Twilight Courier

When I think of the near forgotten dream of someone quite dear to me
I imagine a conversation with you
Your advice and patient listening

And so
Here again
The thoughts of the sublime
And a missed opportunity

Return
After a long voyage
Once again
In study of the maps and charts
Still in search of those expressions found not of mortal substance
